Description

Introducing the ultimate powerhouse in PC builds: the latest generation of high-performance components, crafted for professionals who demand nothing but the best. Harnessing the unrivaled processing power of the cutting-edge M1 Pro or M1 Max chip, designed specifically for power users, this PC delivers groundbreaking performance while ensuring exceptional battery life for those extended work sessions.

Featuring a breathtaking Liquid Retina XDR display, immerse yourself in stunning visuals with unparalleled clarity and color accuracy. Capture every detail with the best-in-class camera and audio setup ever integrated into a PC notebook.

Designed to meet the needs of professionals, this PC comes equipped with all the ports you require for seamless connectivity and productivity. Experience the next level of computing with a build that redefines what's possible. M1 Pro redefines the boundaries of performance, taking the exceptional capabilities of the M1 architecture to unprecedented heights for pro users.
